all_questions.question: What was the primary task of the eye tracking study?
all_questions.context: They were doing these assessments under an eye tracker.

all_questions.question: How many colleagues participated in the eye tracking study?
all_questions.context: I had, I think, just eight colleagues.

all_questions.question: What order did people follow when reading the candidates?
all_questions.context: They read the reference and then they read one by one the candidates and then they score it.

all_questions.question: Would analyzing the data on pairwise comparisons be interesting?
all_questions.context: So this is an invitation for anyone to analyze the data.

all_questions.question: What potential benefit of pairwise comparisons compared to re-reading was mentioned in the document?
all_questions.context: It would be interesting to see whether people like focused on errors and whether the score correlates with the errors appearing there and so on.
